scripts.build: node reuse lib/symbol-name-encoder.ru > lib/_symbol-name-encoder.js && mv lib/_symbol-name-encoder.js lib/symbol-name-encoder.js && node reuse lib/definition-importer.ru > lib/_definition-importer.js && mv lib/_definition-importer.js lib/definition-importer.js && node reuse lib/parser.ru > lib/_parser.js && mv lib/_parser.js lib/parser.js
scripts.coverage-travis-ci: npm run-script build && mocha --require blanket -R travis-cov "**/*.unit.js" "**/*.feature.js"
scripts.coverage: npm run-script build && mocha --require blanket -R html-cov "**/*.unit.js" "**/*.feature.js" > coverage.html
